Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
06.08.2014 SH SCR19055 Added 3 new input fields AL.D.Discount1Amount, AM.D.Discount2Amount, AN.D.Discount3Amount, stored to NFIN
09.05.2014 SH SCR18879 Stop program if >= 100 blank rows are in the file (successively)
20.02.2014 SH SCR18686 Added new module BSP201-23 Update DCDD
02.07.2013 SH SCR18240 Extended condition for update NFIN_DEBC_DEBC
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
13.08.2012 GB SCR17499 Changed update the NFIN_LAWY_LAWYER from D.Lawyercode to 0
27.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended invoice number from alpha 10 to 20
19.05.2011 SH SCR16443 Added PI.OVERRIDE_ADMNO incl. handling
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
22.11.2010 SH SCR15901 Replaced asterix (*) with 'A' in invoice number
29.07.2010 SH SCR15201 Added GB007.PI.LANGUAGE = CLNT201_LANGUAGE
18.01.2010 SH SCR15255 Fixed bug update NFIR_DEBTORNUMBERTYPE =
D.DebtorNumberFlag (was hardcoded = 1)
10.12.2009 SH SCR15162 Added test on 2 digit currency code (CURR_CODEHELLER)
03.06.2009 SH SCR14663 Added NFIN_TEXT
09.12.2008 SH SCR14202 Mult amounts by 100 if currency = JPY and admin = 3
05.11.2008 SH SCR14071 Solved problem with tests on existing clients
09.10.2008 SH SCR14031 Remove exceptions for client 1-1636 (--> D.DebtorNumber)
30.09.2008 SH SCR14011 Added UFB544.PI.RemoveLeadingZeros=TRUE
22.02.2008 SH SCR13420 Moved BSP202-10 from part "stored after first NFIN"
to the end of program after calilng BSP202-20
13.02.2008 SH SCR13382 Skipped storing of NFIN if invoice amount = 0
06.02.2008 SH SCR13362 Convert Debtor number client, invoice number and
debtor ID to upper case
05.02.2008 SH SCR13332 Extended D.DebtorNumberFlag for blank allowed
04.02.2008 SH SCR13273 Changed reformating of D.DebtorNumber (replace '0600');
Extended tests on value / due date to be validated if '0'
30.01.2008 SH SCR13340 Added test on CLNT307_CLNTINVNO_NUMERIC to remove
leading zeros from invoice number
17.01.2008 SH SCR13299 Changed message in case of total amounts are not correct
11.01.2008 SH SCR13273 Extended reformating of D.DebtorNumber (replace '0600' by
'0000' in NL for clients 1636, 5049, 6392)
08.01.2007 SH SCR13260 Store one extra NFER row in case of >= 10 errors
21.12.2007 SH SCR13235 Extended test on debtor number ('0000000000')
17.12.2007 SH SCR13224 Diff. changes see, SCR for details
19.11.2007 SH SCR13092 Added UFB544 to reformat debtor/invoice number
13.11.2007 SH SCR13112 Added PI.BSP202-20.RECORDFALG
24.10.2007 SH SCR13030 Added test on GNRL_CODE=NL to set NFIN_AWKAI
24.10.2007 SH SCR13020 Changed markcode handling
17.10.2007 SH SCR13000 Extended handling of amount fields (supports now minus
sign, replaces '.' by ',' as decimal separator)
12.10.2007 SH SCR12985 Changed layout of input form, now fully csv support
is implemented
04.10.2007 SH SCR12908 Added GB005 to validate NatRegNumber, '-' are now also
allowed as date separators; Extended test on DebtorNumberFlag with 0; extended
picture handling for T.TotalAmount acc. to thousand separators
06.07.2007 SH SCR12330 Extended test wrong debtor number with field
D.AJ_NationalRegistrationNumber = blank
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
10 errors are detected
-- Be carefully with changing the sequenece, adding new input fields, see R.P.
where VarSet is used to extract the fields from a generic input row
.. in case of new fields have to be added, see R.S. where the extracting of
input fields has to be extended
-- End input fields
-- Input variables with proper FL pictures
-- Previous values of input variables, have to be tested only in case of changes
-- Database fields uses to store NFIN, fetched already during validations
-- Validation and error handling
-- uses for storing to new invoice row
-- Variables for BSP201-23 - Update DEBTOR_CLIENT_DD
-- Set variables
... unique for 10, 20, 40 rows, will be increased with +1
-- Init following check variables to test if there is a change with values which
never exists (if using default values then the program never detects empty / 0 fields)
-- Perform the following steps only if there's no reason to reject the file, see
call of BSP202_10 in R.S.
-- Error --> No total row exists (flag 30)
-- If at least one NFER (error) row is stored set PO.ERROR = TRUE
-- Define the handling type if at least one NFIN row is stored and no
errors are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Check if file has to be rejected after the last NFIN row is stored and no
errors are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Reset variables
-- Read complete row from input file
-- Extract all 40 fields from input row (new since SCR12985 -->SH 12.10.2007)
... removed possible double quotes from fields, also more than only one
leading/trailing double quote, e.g. "Test" or ""Test""
... write extracted value from input field to related variable
-- First line should contain a header row, in this case ignore this line and
blank lines have to be ignored
-- Error --> Recordflag not 10, 20, 30, 40
-- Handle detail records (10,20,40)
... set record flag for BSP220-20, uses to set the runtype
... always update NFIR_ADMNO / NFIR_CLNTNO for first row where adminstration or
client exist
...in case of no errors are detected store row in NFIN (skip storing NFIN rows
if invoice amount = 0)
-- Handle total record (30), in case of no erros are detected in detail rows
-- More than 99 empty rows without an intermediate row with data in file are not allowed
... set to 100, see below, to stop program
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
10 errors are detected
-- Inform users that testing is stopped because of >= 10 errors
-- Check / delete leading double quotes (chr(34))
-- Check / delete trainling double quotes (chr(34))
... fetch error text
-- Format input fields to their proper FL pictures
... Administration number has to be overwritten if PI.OVERRIDE_ADMNO > 0
-- Check for existing client (only once or in case of changes)
-- Error --> Client does not exisrts
-- Correction of amounts
... multiply by 100 if D.Currency_ISO = JPY (correction of value which is
updated wrong in iBolt
-- Check debtor number
... error --> debtor number = blank or only contains '0' characters
-- Reformat debtor number
... always if GSET_QUANTITY(38) >1 and <9,
else leading zeros have to be removed if GSET_QUANTITY = 0 and
CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC =Y
-- Check debtor number falg
... must be in (0,1,2,3)
... if blank or 0 then set to 2
-- Invoice number contains quotes --> Error
-- Invoice number has to be reformatted (no leading zeros/blanks)
-- Check invoice date
... must have value and must be a valid date
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check value date
... optional but must be a valid date if <> blank / 0 / 00000000
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check Debit/Credit flag
... in case of invoice amount contains a minus sign for negative amounts
... error --> not (-, +, space)
-- Check currency code (only in case of changes)
... if no ISO currency is found, check to retrieve the ISO currency code with
2 digit curency code
-- Error --> Currency code = blank or does not exisrts
-- Check TermCode (optional field)
... reset variable
-- Error --> Termcode does not exist
-- Check net payment days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check due date
... optional but must be a valid date if <> blank / 0 / 00000000
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check discount 1 days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check discount 2 days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check discount 2 days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- End of month flag must be in (0,1,space)
-- Extra days end of month must be < 31 (optional field)
-- Transfer days end of month must be < 31 (optional field)
-- Check debtor name (must be <> blank if GNRL_CODE <> 'NL')
-- Check debtor country code (only in case of changes)
(optional field in case of GNRL_CODE = NL)
-- Error --> Country code does not exisrts
-- Check mark code --> optional field (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Mark code does not exisrts
-- Check schedule number (mandatory if record flag = 10 and
GSET_YESNO(243) = Y
-- Check lawyer code --> optional field
-- Error --> Lawyer code does not exisrts
-- Check mark code text --> optional field (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Mark code text does not exisrts
-- Validate national registration number
... v.COUNT uses at the end of the program to compare with the value in the
falg 30 row
... multiply by 100 if D.Currency_ISO = JPY
-- Replace asterix (*) with 'A' in invoice number
-- The official date format is DDMMYYYY but also date with separators like
DD.MM.YYYY, DD-MM-YYYY are allowed and 6 digits dates like DDMMYY
If a date has 5 or 7 digits it has to be prefixed with a 0
... remove '.' as date separators
... remove '-' as date separators
... if dates have 5 or 7 positions prefix one 0
-- Decimal separator '.' in amount fields have to be replaced
-- Decimal separator '.' in discount percenatges fields have to be replaced
by default separator ','
... fetch error text
-- Reset total variables
-- Format input fields to their proper FL pictures
-- Total amount
... contains thousand separators(.) and decimal separators (,) remove thousand
separators
.. contains '.' has decimal separator --> replace by comma
-- Total number of detail rows <> Total number
-- Total NFIN amounts <> Total amount
-- Uses in parent task to write error to NFER if no total row exists
... fetch error text
-- Increase v.NFIN_LINENO with +1 for the next detail rows
-- Update debtor fields
-- D.DebtorNumber (replace quote () by space)
... replace quote (') by space
... replace quote (') by space
-- If a termcode exists for the invoce use variables from TRCM to
update/overwrite some NFIN fields
-- If GSET_YESNO(177) = 'Y' and NFIN_DUEDATE < NFIN_INVDATE correct ....
-- Update markcode fields
-- Update some NFIR fields for first stored NFIN row
-- variables uses to check of totals are OK
... devide amounts by 100 if NFIN_CURRENCY = JPY
... variables used for BSP201-23
